version_description:
This update includes:
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Relax with the classic Klondike Solitaire, enjoyed by millions of players around the world in this top-rated free card game app.

The Murka Team

This update includes various bug fixes and performance improvements.
- Strange pop-ups won't bother you anymore.
- Notifications will work correctly now.
- Cards won't disappear anymore!
- Fixed the ad loading problem when trying to shuffle.
- You can now play as many winnable decks as you want!
- Daily Challenge tutorial wonâ€™t bother you anymore :)
- The Undo button will not turn the cards anymore!
Relax with the classic Klondike Solitaire.
The Murka Team

This update features various redesigns to please your eyes, performance improvements for some joyous times, and bug fixes for a smoother gaming experience.
Relax with the classic Klondike Solitaire, enjoyed by millions of players around the world in this top-rated free card game app.

Happy New Year, Solitaire Fans!

The Murka Team

Hello Folks, this update includes:
- Minor technical improvements.
Relax with the classic Klondike Solitaire.
